entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Revelstoke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:54 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Revelstoke Airport 12:26 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: N 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm except 20 cm over western sections. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
